scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist && copyfiles -u 1 helpers/**/* dist/helpers && copyfiles -u 1 routes/**/* dist/routes && copyfiles -u 1 config/**/* dist/config && copyfiles -u 1 windows/**/* dist/windows && copyfiles -u 1 layouts/**/* dist/layouts && copyfiles assets/* dist/ && copyfiles assets/css/* dist/assets/css && copyfiles electron.js dist/
scripts.build:package: npm run build -- && copyfiles package.json dist/ && cd dist && electron-packager . explore-english --overwrite --asar=true --platform=linux --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=../release-builds --icon=./assets/icon.png
